description.text: You cause an object or location to emanate magical vibrations that repel either a specific kind of intelligent creature or creatures of a particular alignment, as defined by you. The kind of creature to be affected must be named specifically. A creature subtype is not specific enough. Likewise, the specific alignment to be repelled must be named.

sections.Components: V, S, M/DF (a lump of alum soaked in vinegar)
sections.Targets: one location (upt o a 10-ft. cube/level) or one object
